title: Chestnut stuffed apples
ingredients: ['For the filling', '450g sweet chestnuts', '2 tablespoons butter', '110g soft brown sugar', '200g digestive biscuits, crushed', '110g raisins', 'For the apples', '8 large apples', '2 tablespoons butter', '8 slices oranges', '8 slices lemon', '8 star anise', 'ground cinnamon, to taste', 'ground nutmeg, to taste', 'vanilla ice cream, to serve']
